answerText: Beno Gutenberg[10] The D-double prime layer is found in the lower portion of this layer of the earth, which is located between the outer core and crust.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 7 | 9 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This man collaborated with Charles Richter in developing the Richter magnitude scale. For 10 points each: [10] Name this German seismologist who names a seismic velocity discontinuity at the bottom of the D-double prime layer.
